function.name: channel_setByProgram
function.description: This function is used to change the channel of a smart home appliance or place by specifying the program name.

location.description: The location where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

room.description: The room where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the channel.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment related to the device.

programName.description: The name of the program currently airing on the desired channel.
